content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### Coal and Iron Ore Supply
- Coal is being harvested and inserted into the furnaces to fuel the smelting process.
- Iron ore is being harvested and inserted into the furnaces for the production of iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft without sufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough iron plates in your inventory before attempting to craft additional stone furnaces.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items (coal or iron ore) in your inventory before trying to insert them into the furnaces.
- Check your inventory before inserting items to avoid attempting to insert when you have none.

### Errors when placing items
- Ensure that the target furnace is not already occupied or has enough capacity to accept the items before attempting to insert them.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to check the inventory of the furnaces to confirm they have items to extract before attempting to extract them.

### Errors when inserting iron ore into furnaces
- Confirm that you have iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. This error occurred multiple times across different steps.
